detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract ZODI (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#471-667) has payable functions:
	 - ZODI.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#613-666)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [ZODI](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#L471-L667) has payable functions:
	 - [ZODI.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#L613-L666)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

	- ERC20Detailed.symbol() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#459-461) (function)

ERC20Detailed.constructor(string,string,uint8).decimals (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#443) shadows:
	- ERC20Detailed.decimals() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#466-468) (function)

ZODI.balanceOf(address).owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#498) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#97) (state variable)

ZODI._autoUnlock(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#588-598) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timelockList[holder][idx]._releaseTime <= now (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#590)
detectors.markdown:
[ZODI._autoUnlock(address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#L588-L598) uses timestamp for comparisons

detectors.description:
ZODI.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#613-666) uses assembly
	- INLINE ASM (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#616-666)
Pragma version^0.5.0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI__1.sol#9) allows old versions
solc-0.5.0 is not recommended for deployment
